subtitle: Work together with your colleagues
title: COLLABORATION
subject: DentalTap - Collaborate with your colleagues
descr: Invite your colleagues and digitize your clinic completely, so anyone in your clinic can benefit of digital practice management
staff.title: For all clinic staff
staff.descr: Suitable for dentists, front desk managers, assistants and clinic managers
rule.title: Setup an access rules
rule.descr: Set the access rules for each of your employee depending on their role in dental clinic
comm.title: Communications
comm.descr: Easy dental case-sharing and patient record transfer between dentists, receptionists and all clinic staff
more.title: Want to know more?
more.descr: Lets schedule a quick call and we will explain how you can work with all of your colleagues and simplify your daily workflow
